title: Universal Internet Access
description: In 2023, 100% of both male and female populations in the UAE have access to the internet, showcasing a fully connected society.

title: Minimal Adolescent School Dropout
description: As of 2023, only 0.34% of adolescents of lower secondary school age are out of school, indicating a strong educational retention rate.

title: High International Migrant Population
description: In 2015, international migrants made up 88.4% of the UAE's population, reflecting its status as a global hub for expatriates.

title: Low Adult Female Mortality Rate
description: The mortality rate for adult females in the UAE is 18.47 per 1,000 female adults as of 2023, one of the lowest globally.

title: Youthful Population Structure
description: In 2023, 11.42% of the female and 14.67% of the male populations are aged 25-29, indicating a youthful demographic.

title: Low Elderly Population
description: As of 2023, only 0.91% of females and 0.69% of males are aged 65-69, with 2.11% of females aged 65 and above, suggesting a relatively young population.
